alert.note: Alert for Dickinson; Iron; Marquette (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Iron, northwestern Dickinson and central Marquette Counties through 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/... At 243 PM EDT/143 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Little Presque Isle to near Amasa. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Marquette and Trowbridge Park around 250 PM EDT. Presque Isle around 255 PM EDT. Harvey around 300 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Shot Point, Channing, Witch Lake and Squaw Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT/800 PM CDT/ for north central Upper and south central Upper Michigan.
